title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 116.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 116.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations
(a) Any State
department or agency or political subdivision, except a board of education or a
board of cooperative educational services, which provides educational programs
and services for children who are in full-time residential care in homes or
facilities operated or supervised by such agencies, and who do not attend the
public schools of the school districts in which such homes or facilities are
located, shall provide such programs and services in accordance with the
requirements of sections
116.2, 116.5, 116.6
and either section 116.3 or
116.4
of this Part. Prior approval
of the commissioner is required to provide educational programs and services
pursuant to the provisions of section
116.4
in lieu of the provisions of
section
116.3
of this Part. (b) The educational programs and services
conducted or supervised by a State department, agency or political subdivision, pursuant to this Part, shall be subject to review by the Commissioner of

Education. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
116.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
